properties.areaDesc: Lake Michigan from Seul Choix Point to Rock Island Passage 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan South of a line from Seul Choix Point to the Mackinac Bridge and North of a line from Charlevoix MI to South Fox Island 5NM offshore
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 10 at 10:31AM CST until January 12 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
waves 5 to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...Lake Michigan South of a line from Seul Choix Point to
the Mackinac Bridge and North of a line from Charlevoix MI to
South Fox Island 5NM offshore and Lake Michigan from Seul
Choix Point to Rock Island Passage 5NM offshore to Mid Lake.

* WHEN...From 6 PM Saturday to 2 AM CST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SATURDAY TO 2 AM CST SUNDAY
